name: Hupsi
description:
It's a music experience so enable audio. Hupsi is a playful and super adorable musical adventure. 

It was designed for the youngest players and for iOS and runs smoother on iPhone, but since it is quite enjoyable at any age we decided to share it for free here.  Have fun!

The wonderful forest is full of friendly animals making music and sounds as you interact and explore. 

There is no wrong or right, just play and enjoy.

If you like it, consider supporting it on the Apple AppStore.  More information at http://playhupsi.com/
